mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Octavia Le Vert to Susan L. Pellet, 1858 March 23
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Le Vert, Octavia Walton, 1810-1877
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Octavia Le Vert, Vice Regent for Alabama, to Susan L. Pellet, Secretary of the MVLA, March 23, 1858. Encloses a check and discusses total amount she has raised thus far. She is proud of her ability to raise this money despite being told it would be too difficult. She is grateful for the men of Mobile who have helped her quite a bit, although the women “have never aided me.”
